title: Demotion bug, be careful!
body:
â€‹Hi. 
Last night I was in Silver V, in promos to get into Silver IV. I lost my first promo and went to bed. 
I woke up today, lost my 2nd promo making me unsuccessful in my promotion series and I was demoted all the way to Bronze  I?

Surely this is a bug!? The "you have been unsuccessful in your promotions" popup in the post-game lobby was gibberish code. 

Or is this normal? Because I'll be quitting LoL if that's the case.

replies.body:
Hey Gucci Senpai,

I'm fairly confident this is a bug. There was a new patch ([patch 8.24)](https://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-824-notes) put in overnight which should have removed division V from all tiers and moved everyone in a division V to division IV. But it seems like a strange interaction may have occurred because you were in a promo series.

Get in touch with Riot [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and let them know what happened. They should be able to confirm what happened and fix the issue if necessary.

Good luck! :)

Thank you for the informative response. 
I've submitted my ticket to Riot and will be sure to share the outcome.

Update.
Where I am currently sitting with my ticket: 

_"I understand your confusion but it looks like this was caused by the new update and the addition of Iron and removing the 5th division from every rank. I am going to talk this over with the team just to make sure."_

Hey, I've had a similar thing happen to me. This is not exclusive to promotions - it seems that your very first loss in the new Silver tier will demote you straight back to Bronze 1 :/  (At least that's what happened to me). First game played - loss = immediately demoted to Bronze 1.
i got this and also got the same message from riot and still havent heard back from them
